Description: This a rare blue Burns London Brian May Signature Electric Guitar in Blue. The guitar and case are in mint like-new condition. The deep dark transparent blue is best seen on the two pictures of the back. This guitar is light, compact, easy playing. It is setup nicely. Includes manual to help you sort out the various switch options. The Burns TriSonics give a chimy bright single coil tone, but can bring the dirt too, perfect for getting Brian's unique sound, but suited for other styles as well. A rockin' machine true to Brian May's specs!Brian May's classic, handmade Red Special has been faithfully re-created by Burns to deliver a guitar that will unleash your creativity. It features 3 single-coil pickups with individual on/off and phase reverse switches, plus master tone and volume controls. The body and neck are mahogany and the neck is fitted with a grade-A ebony fingerboard and 24 medium frets (including a zero fret). 3 Burns Tri-sonic pickups wired in series, handmade to the original design, deliver the punch, bite, and clarity you've always wanted. Individual on/off and phase reverse switches, plus master tone and volume controls. Whether you are looking for the "Queen Sound" that Brian May helped make famous or are more into funk, blues, or jazz, this guitar lets you express your artistry.
